flavorText: Did you go through all the trouble to unscramble this?
name: Rocket-Powered Turbo Slug
originalText: Super haste (This may attack the turn before you play it. (You may put this card into play from your hand, tapped and attacking, during your declare attackers step. If you do, you lose the game at the end of your next turn unless you pay this card's mana cost during that turn.))

rulings.text: The flavor text unscrambles to “Did you go through all the trouble to unscramble this?“

text: Super haste (This may attack the turn before you cast it. (You may put this card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped and attacking during your declare attackers step. If you do, you lose the game at the beginning of your next turn's end step unless you pay this card's mana cost during that turn.))
